name: htb-workflow-domain-discovery
args: 1. Run htb-domain-extractor to find domains from redirects
2. Copy the discovered domain from console output
4. Run htb-ffuf-subdomain-domain with discovered domain instead of IP
Example workflow: ipcrawler run htb/htb-domain-extractor 10.10.10.100, then ipcrawler run htb/htb-ffuf-subdomain-domain discovered.htb
description: HTB workflow guide for chaining web-tech-headers domain discovery with FFUF scans
author: HTB Team
